participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is hardworking and dedicated, often found buzzing around his farm tending to his bees. He approaches life with a sense of humor and is not afraid to make bold choices.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i'm close to. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is creative and nurturing, with a passion for capturing the beauty of life through her camera lens. She is optimistic and enjoys exploring new cultures.
participant_2.background: i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i am an elementary school teacher. i am fluent in english spanish and french.
